meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Beverly Garcia Jeff Versteeg Christi Esterle Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6874.

td.p: Beverly Garcia, a lawyer from Quincy, Massachusetts
Jeff Versteeg, an account executive from Cleveland, Ohio
Christi Esterle, a librarian and stay-at-home mom from Colorado Springs, Colorado (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,999)

tr.td: BORN IN THE USA
GLORY DAYS
COVER ME
THE GHOST OF TOM JOAD
BRUCE SPRINGSTEEN
THE "E" STREET BAND
